name: CVE-2020-1593
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Windows Media Audio Decoder improperly handles objects, aka 'Windows Media Audio Decoder Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2020-1508.
